title: Aspiring Cyclist and the Domineering CEO - Novel Updates
tags: Doting Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Showbiz   Transmigration
author: 隔窗云雾
description:
Oh wow! An aspiring cyclist falls in love with a domineering CEO!

Domineering CEO: Man, you are playing with fire!

Aspiring cyclist: That’s it! That’s the spirit! Come on! You can do it!

Domineering CEO: ???

An inspiring (goofy) doting (outrageously sweet) story of a dreamy cyclist falls in love with a domineering CEO.

A domineering CEO who is a neat freak participates in an idol talent show in order to woo his little lover who is a cyclist with one track mind — bike track>
